downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Multisite Activation
downloadDescription: This paper describes the steps needed to activate the multisite functionality for users who are upgrading from a previous release of Microsoft Dynamics AX.
detailsSection:
This document walks you through the multisite activation steps.

To start using the new multisite functionality, users who are upgrading from a previous release of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 must run the multisite activation wizard for each company account to make the necessary changes to the inventory dimension settings and the inventory-related transactions. These changes include:
  • Activating the site and warehouse inventory dimensions in all dimension groups
  • Making the site dimension mandatory on all inventory transactions
  • Updating all transactions with an association to the site

Multisite functionality is initially inactive when you are upgrading from a previous release so you can set up the master data that is required for the multisite functionality, and to correct any data inconsistencies before generating site-specific transactions.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
additionalInformationSection:
• A prerequisite for running the activation is that no inventory dimension records can reference a value for both the site and the warehouse.

  • For users who have a new installation of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, multisite functionality already is activated by default.
